name: ReynandrielPT
department: Informatics on Institut Teknologi Sepuluh Nopember
bio_short: DevOps engineer passionate about automation, scalability, and cloud infrastructure. 6 years of experience with AWS and Kubernetes.
bio_long: Rey is a highly skilled DevOps engineer who thrives on solving complex infrastructure challenges. With 6 years of experience in cloud computing and automation, Alex specializes in AWS, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipeline optimization. They have helped numerous companies scale their infrastructure while maintaining reliability and security. Alex is also passionate about mentoring junior developers and promoting DevOps best practices.

career_highlights.title: Multi-Cloud Architecture
career_highlights.description: Designed and implemented multi-cloud strategy reducing infrastructure costs by 35% while improving reliability

testimonials.text: Alex's expertise in cloud architecture and automation saved us countless hours and significantly improved our deployment process.
